name: Xtrial Racing
overview:
Get ready for some cool and fast-paced motorbike game and compete against the time! Unlock other vehicles and tracks in X Trail Racing! Complete each track and collect three stars on each of the track by riding as fast as possible.

X Trail Racing is a simple yet addicting side-scrolling motorbike game where your goal is to complete each track as fast as possible and complete some of the world’s craziest motorbike tracks. In this game, your objective is to cross the finish line safely without crashing your bike or stumbling over while doing it as fast as possible. The game features a total of 30 tracks. Will you be able to complete all the tracks and win glory for yourself? Have fun!
